name: greengrocer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who owns or works in a shop that sells fresh vegetables and fruit
(also greengrocer's) a shop in which fresh vegetables and fruit are sold
Kondor83/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
Examples
I got this fantastic pumpkin from the local greengrocer.The greengrocer had some lovely local asparagus on sale today.
